no.ntnu.imt3281.project1

Class TextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.imt3281.project1.BaseComponent
      • no.ntnu.imt3281.project1.TextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class TextArea
extends BaseComponent
    TextArea class represents a definable JTextArea object to be used in the GridBagLayout editor.
    Author:
    thomasgg, sadario
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
